400: Job Overview: UnifyWork is on a mission to build mobile and web applications that transform the hiring process to be more equitable and effective for job seekers and employers. Reporting to the VP of Platform Architecture, we’re recruiting a Product Manager to help us define the roadmap for these applications and guide the delivery of new features. The person filling this critical role should be respectful of and able to work effectively with all nature of diversity and should effectively respond with non-defensiveness and curiosity to interpersonal, process or content conflicts that may arise. Objectives of this Role: Understand the needs of the job seekers, employers, educators, and workforce development groups that use our platform. Understand the needs and priorities of our cross-functional team of engineers, data scientists, customer success managers, marketers, and salespeople. Guide the continued improvement of our platform’s user experience. Guide the roadmap and delivery of major new initiatives. The guiding principle of our Product Technology organization is to deliver value to our users as efficiently as possible at low cost and low overhead. Sustainability and work-life balance are our North Star. As part of our Product team, you will work closely with Product Engineers, Platform Engineers, and Cloud Operations Engineers to deliver product features and processes that will scale as our company grows. Responsibilities: Define new product requirements. Design and prototype new products and product features. Assist in the prioritization of feature delivery and the communication of delivery timelines. Assist in the project management of our various development teams. Guide the user acceptance testing (UAT) of the implementation of your requirements. Identify bugs and work with our software engineers to fix them. Identify workarounds for bugs and communicate them to our Customer Success team. Required Skills and Qualifications: 4+ years experience as a Product Manager, preferably at a start-up or in an entrepreneurial role within a larger organization. We are looking for someone who has experience bringing products to market. Experience identifying and analyzing bugs. Experience finding workarounds for bugs while they are being fixed.
